list_definition.definition: of, or relating to, character or behaviour especially right behaviour

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He leads a very moral (= good) life.

list_definition.definition: the lesson to be learned from something that happens, or from a story

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The moral of this story is that crime doesn’t pay.
